t:type.name: GoogleDeviceName
t:type.t:description: Represents a the device name model used by Google. Despite all fields being optional, at least one is required.

t:attribute.name: defaultNames
t:attribute.description: Default names typically based on the specific device

t:attribute.name: name
t:attribute.description: End user defined name of the device

t:attribute.name: nicknames
t:attribute.description: Set of additional names the user has specified for the device
